remarks: The rational numbers are dense in ` RR ` : any two real numbers have a rational between them.  Exercise 6 of [Apostol] p. 28.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2014.)
statement:
qbtwnre $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ A < B ) -> E. x e. QQ ( A < x /\ x < B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
